actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 42, United States Code, to provide for the extension of reemployment rights to certain employees of the Department of Energy.

summary.text: Amends the Department of Energy Organization Act to extend existing reemployment rights of Federal employees transferred to the Department of Energy until two years after the effective date of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 42, United States Code, to provide for the extension of reemployment rights to certain employees of the Department of Energy.
